Name: Sloane Square cocktail
Ingredients: 40 ml Speyside single malt Scotch whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: An unusual pairing of single malt scotch whisky and tequila with herbal complexity courtesy of Bénédictine liqueur, freshened with orange zestiness.
History: Adapted from a 2013 recipe by Paige McCune of AroundOrTwo.com
Nutrition: One serving of Sloane Square cocktail contains 171 calories
